Lines.Description: Print 'Runtime Error: Bad teleporter' on quit
If 'camera_x' LessThan 'Player_X / XRes * XRes' ELSE GOTO 00000804
If 'camera_x' GreaterThan 'Player_X / XRes * XRes' ELSE GOTO 00000888
If 'camera_y' LessThan 'Player_y / yres * yres' ELSE GOTO 00000972
If 'camera_y' GreaterThan 'Player_y / yres * yres' ELSE GOTO 00001056
Print 'AGA is required for this Scorpion Engine Game' on quit
Print 'Cannot set yres while level loaded' on quit
Say 'This is a simple sample to demonstrate printing strings'
Say 'I can't find the AGA chipset'
Say 'I'm going to try loading a save file'
Say 'Loaded file. Last random number was {lastdice}'
Say 'Could not load file (first time running this program?)'

Say 'I'm going to pick a number between 1 and 99...<5>
{Dice}'
Say 'use < 1 ><1> to < 5 ><2> to insert <3> delays <4> in <5> text!'

Say 'Next is a demo of choices.
Yes to repeat
No to quit.
'
Say 'I'm going to try saving that number - {dice} - to disk for next time'
Print 'We can also print a quit message. Last dice roll was {dice} Also have saved dice to environment, try typing echo $dice' on quit
